title: Perceived Usefulness Analysis and Application of E-Learning for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of educational technology and e-learning platforms
context.additional_context: An online real-time training course for in-service secondary school teachers conducted in a digital device-provided environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze four core elements (learning environment, lecture delivery method, tutor characteristics, facilitating conditions) explaining the perceived usefulness of e-learning.
Learners can measure peer teachers’ perceptions of e-learning usefulness using survey tools.
Learners can interpret causal relationships in collected data by applying structural equation modeling (SEM).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
